FuncDef: This command matches the tag value in static or IGP routes. A decimal or hexadecimal value of 4 octets can be entered. For IS-IS, OSPF, and static routes, all four octets can be used. For RIP and RIPng, only the two most significant octets are used if more than two octets are configured.

ParaDef.Info: Matches the configured tag value. Values-Accepts decimal or hexadecimal formats:.
Specifies that no tag value is set.
